template_input_params.name: key_name
template_input_params.label: Key Name
template_input_params.description: Name or reference of SSH key to provision IBM Cloud instances with

template_input_params.name: datacenter
template_input_params.label: Datacenter
template_input_params.description: Datacenter

template_input_params.name: private_vlan_router_hostname
template_input_params.label: Private Vlan Router Hostname
template_input_params.description: Private VLAN router to place all VMs behind.  e.g. bcr01a. See Network > IP Management > VLANs in the portal. Leave blank to let the system choose.

template_input_params.name: private_vlan_number
template_input_params.label: Private Vlan Number
template_input_params.description: Private VLAN number to place all VMs on.  e.g. 1211. See Network > IP Management > VLANs in the portal. Leave blank to let the system choose.

template_input_params.name: public_vlan_router_hostname
template_input_params.label: Public Vlan Router Hostname
template_input_params.description: Public VLAN router to place all VMs behind.  e.g. fcr01a. See Network > IP Management > VLANs in the portal. Leave blank to let the system choose.

template_input_params.name: public_vlan_number
template_input_params.label: Public Vlan Number
template_input_params.description: Public VLAN number to place all VMs on.  e.g. 1171. See Network > IP Management > VLANs in the portal. Leave blank to let the system choose.

template_input_params.name: deployment
template_input_params.label: Deployment
template_input_params.description: Identifier prefix added to the host names.

template_input_params.name: os_reference_code
template_input_params.label: Os Reference Code
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud OS reference code to determine OS, version, word length

template_input_params.name: domain
template_input_params.label: Domain
template_input_params.description: Specify domain name to be used for linux customization on the VMs, or leave blank to use <instance_name>.icp

template_input_params.name: private_network_only
template_input_params.label: Private Network Only
template_input_params.description: Specify false to place the cluster on the public network. If public network access is disabled, you will require a NAT gateway device like a Gateway Appliance on the VLAN.

template_input_params.name: boot
template_input_params.label: Boot
template_input_params.description: Boot

template_input_params.name: master
template_input_params.label: Master
template_input_params.description: Master

template_input_params.name: mgmt
template_input_params.label: Mgmt
template_input_params.description: Mgmt

template_input_params.name: proxy
template_input_params.label: Proxy
template_input_params.description: Proxy

template_input_params.name: va
template_input_params.label: Va
template_input_params.description: Va

template_input_params.name: worker
template_input_params.label: Worker
template_input_params.description: Worker

template_input_params.name: fs_audit
template_input_params.label: Fs Audit
template_input_params.description: Fs Audit

template_input_params.name: fs_registry
template_input_params.label: Fs Registry
template_input_params.description: Fs Registry

template_input_params.name: docker_package_location
template_input_params.label: Docker Package Location
template_input_params.description: URI for docker package location, e.g. http://<myhost>/icp-docker-17.09_x86_64.bin or nfs:<myhost>/icp-docker-17.09_x86_64.bin

template_input_params.name: image_location
template_input_params.label: Image Location
template_input_params.description: URI for image package location, e.g. http://<myhost>/ibm-cloud-private-x86_64-2.1.0.2.tar.gz or nfs:<myhost>/ibm-cloud-private-x86_64-2.1.0.2.tar.gz

template_input_params.name: icppassword
template_input_params.label: Icppassword
template_input_params.description: Password for the initial admin user in ICP; blank to generate

template_input_params.name: icp_inception_image
template_input_params.label: Icp Inception Image
template_input_params.description: ICP image to use for installation

template_input_params.name: network_cidr
template_input_params.label: Network Cidr
template_input_params.description: Pod network CIDR

template_input_params.name: service_network_cidr
template_input_params.label: Service Network Cidr
template_input_params.description: Service network CIDR
